title: Marketing Plan Builder
description: Create a simple, actionable marketing plan tailored to a small business budget.

body.content: Help me create a marketing plan for my SBDC client.

body.label: Current Channels
body.placeholder: e.g. Facebook page, word of mouth
body.tip: What marketing are they already doing?

body.label: Timeline
body.tip: How long is this plan for?

body.content:
As an SBDC advisor, I need a practical marketing plan I can review with my client. Please create:

1. Marketing Strategy Summary (2-3 sentences) — the big picture approach
2. Recommended Channels — 3-5 marketing channels ranked by priority, with rationale for each based on their budget, industry, and goal
3. 90-Day Action Plan — specific tactics broken into Month 1, Month 2, Month 3 with concrete tasks
4. Budget Allocation — how to divide their monthly budget across channels (percentages and dollar amounts)
5. Content Ideas — 5-10 specific post/campaign ideas they can use right away
6. Success Metrics — what to measure and realistic targets for the timeline
7. Quick Wins — 3 things they can do THIS WEEK with zero budget

Keep it simple and realistic for a small business owner who may be doing their own marketing. No jargon — explain any marketing terms in plain language.
